title: Wizard Active (~lvl90 to 125+)
comment_one: You should try to reach needed accuracy without agi using alchemy. Try to max Gilded>Axe>Overclocked energy>Mana booster>Farsight>Wisdom in that order.
comment_two: 1 point in skills, Max "Power Overwhelming", If chopping score of >100 up to 25 points in "Choppin it up ez". Max "Mana Overdrive" , "Knowledge is power". "You're Next" then "Individual Insight" last for Chaotic Amarok
comment_three: 1 point in "Ice Shards", Max "Floor is Lava", Then "Tornado". Later you can take "Paperwork" and "Earlier Education" when preparing for Chaotic Amarok.
notes: This is a very high level build with the main goal to be AFK gains as you prepare for Chaotic Amarok and beyond. It is okay if you leave *talents at 0 until you have the points.
